ModMetaData.name: Blood Pack
ModMetaData.author: Dalrae,Updated by Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Dalrae's 1.0 'Blood Pack' for 1.1+, updated for JangoD'soul
This mode adds a blood pack. Blood from settlers and prisoners can be collected and administered to the emergency rim.
Language: English, Korean, French, Russian, Simplifed Chinese
